channel.title: I need to set myself on fire
channel.description:
Hey yal
I need to set my hands and arm on fire.
Why?.... because ok?
Anyways, i need to be able have a fully flamed hand for around a minute. Aswell as a flaming arm, from the hand to below the elbow for a simlair amount of time.
Best ive found is a chemical called Heptane...which is too hard to get in Australia, and cloth gloves. Which i dont wanna use because itl look crap.

item.title: I need to set myself on fire
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Perhaps film a few seconds and then loop it using your video editing software? What you really need is a thick substance that burns slowly but consistently… none are coming to mind though (napalm being the exception, but you don’t want that stuff on your arm).

Read full topic
item.source: I need to set myself on fire

item.title: I need to set myself on fire
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Hmm, well, if you want to make an omelet you have to break some eggs, as they say. Butane burns, but it gets hot. It is on fire, ya know, like most flames…You’ll be wanting a fake arm to burn and hold in front of you with a stick or use video manipulation to get the effect you’re looking for, if you can’t talk to a real magician and get some advice on how to not get burned by fire. On the other hand a couple seconds of a chemical burning around your skin won’t burn your skin off. Maybe the hair off your skin…Butane is cheap and easy to get. You’re biggest difficulty is the “Minute” part. That’s a long time to be on fire.

Read full topic
item.source: I need to set myself on fire

item.title: I need to set myself on fire
item.dc:creator: @Squigglyo Squigglyo
item.description:
@Squigglyo wrote:

i would hazard a guess that lighter fluid would also burn the skin off my arms.

Not exactly the effect im looking for

Read full topic
item.source: I need to set myself on fire

item.title: I need to set myself on fire
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Butanes a gas though is it not? You'd need a liquid really.

Most lighters have liquid butane in them. For example hold a bic up to the light and you can see that janx slopping around.

Read full topic
item.source: I need to set myself on fire

item.title: I need to set myself on fire
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

[quote=“Taios, post:8, topic:242853”][quote author=PaulT link=topic=319166.msg2529660#msg2529660 date=1226381217]
Butane.

[/quote]
Butanes a gas though is it not? You’d need a liquid really.
Wonder if you could use deodorant spray? Spray on your arm but still use the technique which you’re meant to use with hexane.[/quote]

I think that will actually work.
you just need a thick layer of it, or else you will feel the pain.

Read full topic
